author: KIT-CMS
body:
#### PR description:

This PR adds a new EDFilter to filter events during generation based on their simplified template cross-section classification. It uses the output of the new Stage1.1 HTXS classifier which was merged this morning. This filter will be used for an official MC production to produce only events in weakly populated HTXS to have enough events in these bins for legacy results in the SM H->tautau analysis.

#### PR validation:

The standard tests as well as creation of a GEN-SIM file using this new filter have been run.
